Safe Raipur

About Us

Home

Safe Raipur Campaign is an initiative of Chhattisgarh InfoSec Society. This will enhance information flow for effective supervision - GP Singh, IG Raipur.

OBJECTIVE : This is a philanthropic initiative of Chhattisgarh InfoSec Society.It is desirable that this facebook page is used as a platform to share actionable information and also information that warrants emergency intervention by Police.This will enable you to participate in creating safe and secure environment for your Raipur city.However, it should not be misunderstood as a portal for registering complaints.
